entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Kangiqsujuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 a.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
Temperature: -4.7°C

Humidity: 93 %

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near noon then snow and local blowing snow. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
